text: int main ( ) { int t , a [ 100 ] [ 100 ] , n , i , j , b [ 100 ] , c = 0 , sum , s , lar , k ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t ) { sum = 0 ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & a [ i ] [ j ] ) ; } } for ( j = 0 ; j < n ; j ++ ) { for ( i = j ; i < n ; i ++ ) { sum = sum + a [ i ] [ j ] ; } b [ c ] = sum ; c ++ ; sum = 0 ; } for ( k = 1 ; k < n ; k ++ ) { for ( j = 0 ; j < n ; j ++ ) { s = j ; for ( i = j ; i < n ; i ++ ) { if ( ( i == ( j + k ) ) && ( ( n - j ) != 1 ) ) s = j ++ ; sum = sum + a [ i ] [ s ] ; } b [ c ] = sum ; c ++ ; sum = 0 ; } } lar = b [ 0 ] ; for ( i = 0 ; i < c ; i ++ ) { if ( b [ i ] > lar ) lar = b [ i ] ; } printf ( "%d\n" , lar ) ; t -- ; } return 0 ; }
